fields.label: Any injuries or areas you need to work around?
fields.value: Mild elbow tendonitis flares up after grappling. Hip flexors feel tight on back squats and sprawls.

fields.label: What are your key performance goals?
Where do you feel weakest right now?
Do you prefer certain training styles?
fields.value: High-intensity circuits, live drilling, sled pushes, and low-rep strength blocks.

fields.label: Do you struggle with any mental blockers or mindset challenges?
fields.value: I struggle to control my aggression. I push too hard and burn out if I feel frustrated during sparring or training.

fields.label: Are there any parts of your previous plan you hated or loved?
fields.value: I hated long steady-state cardio. I loved heavy sled pushes and reactive drills that simulate scrambles or transitions.
